Text:
What is your source?

Do you record it by yourself? Or download it elsewhere?

What programm do you use, encoder and what quality?

I just download all the ones from DJLellone (here on tpb).  256kbit cbr 48khz joint stereo.  I do not know the actual source.

Bundles of ~25 are easier to download than 25 single torrents, and as the single episodes get older, fewer seeds.
